promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young legendary gorilla grass-type pokemon wearing regal bracers. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracerape, a a young legendary gorilla grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Leafy Cyclone. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "grass" or "Bracerape". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, gorilla-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive primate dwells in dense woods, deftly swinging from tree to tree. With its Leafy Cyclone skill, it protects its habitat by whipping up gusts of foliage.
